Apple Maps Finally Has A Street View-Like Feature For These Users - News18
summary:
Apple Maps Finally Has A Street View-Like Feature For These Users

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: News18

Apple Maps is enhancing its user experience with the new 'Look Around' feature, enabling 360-degree views similar to Google Street View to help users explore their surroundings more interactively.

  • The 'Look Around' feature is currently rolling out online and has been available on iOS since version 13.
  • It was first made accessible in select cities in the U.S., Canada, Australia, and the EU.
  • Users can activate Look Around by clicking on the binoculars icon on the Maps web app.
  • Apple plans to expand this feature further and add additional functionalities in the future.
“The feature was introduced on December 11 and is being progressively expanded to include more areas.”

This new feature aims to improve Apple Maps' competitiveness against Google Maps, particularly in regions like India where Apple Maps has less market share.
newTitle: Apple Maps Introduces Street View-Like Feature for Users

title: Motorola Moto G35 5G review: Flashy budget phone with decent performance - Deccan Herald
summary:
Motorola Moto G35 5G Review: Flashy Budget Phone with Decent Performance

Published: 20 December 2024, Source: Deccan Herald

The Motorola Moto G35 5G, launched at a price of Rs 9,999 in India, is a budget smartphone that offers vibrant design, decent performance, and a good battery life.

  • Available in three colors: Guava Red, Midnight Black, and Leaf Green.
  • Equipped with a 6.72-inch full HD+ LCD display and supports 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Powered by a 6nm UNISOC T760 processor and houses a 5,000mAh battery.
  • Features an impressive dual-camera setup with a 50MP main camera and an 8MP ultra-wide camera.
  • IP52 rated for water and dust resistance, with Gorilla Glass 3 for screen protection.
  • Offers a side-mounted fingerprint sensor and a 3.5mm audio jack.
"Performance, battery life and photography wise, it is decent; the device fares well compared to others under the Rs 10,000 price range."

Overall, the Motorola Moto G35 5G is a stylish and capable budget smartphone that appeals to users looking for value without sacrificing quality.
newTitle: Motorola Moto G35 5G Review: Affordable Yet Stylish Performance

title: From latest stickers to NYE calling effects: WhatsApp adds new features - details | Mint - Mint
summary:
WhatsApp Introduces New Features for Holiday and New Year Celebrations

Publication Date: December 20, 2023 | Source: Live Mint

WhatsApp has launched several limited-time features to enhance users' holiday experiences, available from December 20 to January 3.

  • NYE Calling Effects for festive video calls with themed backgrounds and filters.
  • Animated Reactions introducing a confetti animation for message reactions.
  • A New Year sticker pack featuring cheerful designs for sharing greetings.
  • Users made over two billion calls on WhatsApp this holiday season.
  • New functionality to choose specific participants for group calls.
  • Enhanced video calling experience with higher resolution visuals.
“WhatsApp is committed to improving user experience with festive enhancements.”

WhatsApp encourages users to update their app to access these new features during the holiday period.
newTitle: WhatsApp Introduces New Features for Holiday and New Year Celebrations

  • Galaxy S23 FE is now priced at Rs 29,999.
  • Base variant of Galaxy S23 with 128GB storage is available for Rs 28,999.

  • Galaxy S24 series is also discounted, with prices starting at Rs 62,999 for the Galaxy S24.

title: OnePlus 13 and 13R are coming in January to steal Samsung's thunder - Mashable
summary:
OnePlus 13 and 13R are coming in January to steal Samsung's thunder

Publication Date: January 7, 2024 | Source: Mashable

OnePlus is preparing to launch its flagship smartphone, the OnePlus 13, ahead of Samsung's Galaxy S25 release. The phones aim to make a significant impact in the competitive smartphone market.

  • The launch date for the OnePlus 13 is set for January 7, 2024.
  • The OnePlus 13 features a 6.82-inch display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chip, triple 50-megapixel camera, and a 6,000mAh battery.
  • The OnePlus 13R will also be launched, targeting customers seeking a more affordable option.
  • Both phones will have various RAM and storage options, with the 13 offering up to 1,024GB of storage.
  • OnePlus will introduce a new color for the Buds Pro 3 during the launch event.
“The best thing about the OnePlus 13R could be its battery, as OnePlus confirms that it'll also pack a 6,000mAh battery.”

The launch event, scheduled for 10:30 a.m. ET on January 7, promises to reveal more details about pricing and features.
newTitle: OnePlus 13 and 13R Set to Launch in January, Challenging Samsung's Upcoming Releases

title: Apple and NVIDIA partner to boost AI language models’ speed and efficiency - The Financial Express
summary:
Apple and NVIDIA partner to boost AI language models’ speed and efficiency

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Financial Express

Apple has announced a groundbreaking partnership with NVIDIA to enhance the performance of large language models (LLMs). This collaboration will lead to faster and more efficient AI applications across various industries.

  • Introduction of a new text generation technique that greatly increases AI application speed.
  • Integration of Apple's Recurrent Drafter (ReDrafter) with NVIDIA's TensorRT-LLM framework.
  • Reported 2.7x increase in speed for generating tokens in production models.
  • Improved efficiency reduces GPU usage and power consumption for large-scale AI tasks.
  • Access to detailed documentation for developers interested in leveraging ReDrafter.
“This integration is a big step forward for LLMs, crucial for businesses relying on real-time services.”

The partnership between Apple and NVIDIA is a significant advancement in AI technology, promising improved processing speed and efficiency for developers and businesses alike.
newTitle: Apple and NVIDIA Collaborate to Enhance AI Language Models

Xiaomi's Redmi Note 14 Pro+: A Strong Contender in the Smartphone Market

The Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro+ is poised to compete fiercely against flagship rivals with its advanced features and strong performance. It continues the legacy of its predecessors while introducing significant upgrades.

  • The Pro+ model builds on the successful Redmi Note series with refined design and performance.
  • Features a 6.67-inch curved display with a 120Hz refresh rate and peak brightness of 3000 nits.
  • Introduces Qualcomm’s Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip for enhanced performance.
  • Battery capacity increased to 6200mAh with new silicon carbon technology, ensuring longer usage.
  • Camera system includes a 50MP wide primary sensor and a more balanced optical setup.

Overall, the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ stands as a compelling option in the mid-range segment, boasting features that challenge more expensive models and cater to diverse user needs.

title: Samsung slashes prices on Galaxy Watch Ultra, other wearables by Rs 12,000 ahead of S25 launch - The Financial Express
summary:

Date: December 20, 2024 Source: Financial Express

Samsung is slashing prices on its Galaxy Watch Ultra and other wearables, with discounts reaching up to Rs 12,000. This promotion comes just ahead of the Unpacked 2025 event.

  • Galaxy Watch Ultra: Save up to Rs 12,000 with cashback or upgrade bonus.
  • Galaxy Watch 7: Cashback or upgrade bonus of up to Rs 8,000.
  • Galaxy Buds 3 Pro: Instant cashback or upgrade bonus of Rs 5,000.
  • Galaxy Buds 3: Save Rs 4,000 with cashback or upgrade bonus.
  • Galaxy Buds FE: Cashback or upgrade bonus of Rs 4,000.

“The Galaxy Watch Ultra features advanced health monitoring capabilities, including ECG and heart rate tracking.”

The discounts also come with no-cost EMI options for up to 24 months on select wearables.

Samsung Unpacked 2025: Galaxy S25 Series Launch

Samsung's major Unpacked event is scheduled for January 22, 2025, where the new Galaxy S25 series will be unveiled.

title: Huawei beats Apple, dominates wrist-worn device market for most of 2024: IDC - The Indian Express
summary:
Huawei Beats Apple to Lead Global Wrist-Worn Device Market in 2024

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Indian Express

The wrist-worn device market sees a significant shift as Huawei overtakes Apple to secure the top position for the first three quarters of 2024, driven by robust sales of its GT5 series and blood pressure monitor.

  • Huawei has surpassed Apple in the wrist-worn wearable market for the first three quarters of 2024.
  • The top-selling products include Huawei's GT5, GT5 Pro, and Watch D2, contributing to sales growth across various regions.
  • Apple briefly regained the top spot with the Watch Series 10 but faces challenges in innovation.
  • Xiaomi holds third place with significant growth attributed to the Xiaomi Band 9 and Watch S series.
  • China is the largest market for wrist-worn devices, with 45.8 million units shipped and a 20.1% growth year-over-year.
  • Sales in India and the United States have declined compared to the previous year.
“Huawei has managed to outpace Apple in the wrist-worn device segment.”

This trend highlights Huawei's increasing dominance in the wearable market, emphasizing the need for innovation among competitors like Apple to retain market share.
newTitle: Huawei Beats Apple to Lead Global Wrist-Worn Device Market in 2024

title: Amazon Prime Users In India Will Get Less Features For Their Money In 2025: What We Mean - News18
summary:
Amazon Prime Users in India Will Get Less Features For Their Money In 2025

Last Updated: December 20, 2024, 20:04 IST | Source: News18

Amazon Prime users in India are warned that starting January 2025, they will encounter limitations on the number of devices available for streaming, particularly affecting viewing on televisions.

  • Users will be limited to two TVs out of five devices for streaming.
  • The policy aims to limit shared access and comes amid similar changes by other platforms like Netflix.
  • This restriction represents a significant downgrade for those paying Rs 1,499 annually.
  • The term 'household' has become more relevant in streaming services' usage policies.
“Starting January 2025, we are updating our usage terms in India to include up to two TVs as part of your five devices entitlement.”

This shift indicates a broader trend among streaming services towards restricting account sharing, which has been confirmed to benefit companies like Netflix.
newTitle: Amazon Prime Users in India Face Feature Reductions in 2025

  • The incident raises concerns about information security within major tech companies.

The incident underscores the critical importance of confidentiality in tech companies, especially as competition intensifies.

summary:
The Vivo X200 and X200 Pro are now available in India. Here’s everything you need to know about their prices, offers, and more.

Dec 20, 2024 | Hindustan Times

Vivo has launched the X200 series in India, which includes the Vivo X200 and X200 Pro. These devices are powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9400 chipset and feature outstanding camera capabilities. They are now available for purchase with several attractive launch offers.

  • Vivo X200 is priced at ₹65,999 for the 12GB + 256GB model.
  • Vivo X200 Pro is priced at ₹94,999 for the 16GB + 512GB model.
  • Offers include no-cost EMI starting at ₹2,750/month, 10% credit card discounts, and exchange bonuses.
  • Specifications include a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 4,500 nits peak brightness for the Pro model.
  • Both models boast Zeiss optics, with the Pro featuring a 200MP camera.
“The Vivo X200 Pro gets a 6,000mAh battery with support for 90W charging.”

The launch of the Vivo X200 series marks a significant step in Vivo's smartphone offerings in India, appealing to photography enthusiasts with its advanced camera technology.
newTitle: Vivo X200 Pro and X200 Now Available in India: Pricing and Launch Offers
